statements: UPDATE customer_profiles SET customer_name='Alice', email='alice@example.com', phone_number='1234567890' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE customer_profiles SET email='bob@example.com', customer_name='Bob', interactions_count=10 WHERE customer_id=2;
UPDATE customer_profiles SET interactions_count = interactions_count + 1 WHERE customer_id = 123
UPDATE customer_profiles SET email = 'newemail@example.com', phone_number = '555-555-5555' WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe'
UPDATE customers SET customer_name='Jane Doe', email='janedoe@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_date='2022-01-15 12:00:00' WHERE interaction_id=3;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name='John Doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type='Email', interaction_date='2022-09-30 12:00:00' WHERE interaction_id=3;
UPDATE customer_profiles SET name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE purchases SET product_name = 'Headphones', purchase_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE purchase_id = 201;
UPDATE customer_profiles SET interaction_count = 10 WHERE customer_id = 1234;
UPDATE promotions SET discount_amount = 0.2, promotion_name = 'New Promotion' WHERE promotion_id = 5678;
UPDATE customer_profiles SET points = 1000 WHERE customer_id = 12345;
UPDATE customer_promotions SET redeemed = true, redemption_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE customer_id = 54321 AND promotion_id = 789;
UPDATE customer_profiles SET points = points + 100 WHERE customer_id = 123;
UPDATE interaction_logs SET interaction_details = 'Resolved issue with customer' WHERE customer_id = 456 AND interaction_type = 'Support';
UPDATE customer_profiles SET email_address = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 123;
UPDATE targeted_promotions SET promotion_discount = 0.25 WHERE promotion_id = 456;
UPDATE customer_profiles SET phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE purchase_history SET purchase_amount = 150.75, purchase_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE purchase_id = 5;
